plot: Beth suspects that Brooke kept Ridge's letter from Caroline. Storm advises Dave to be patient with Brooke and her infatuation with Ridge. Caroline decides to accept Thorne's proposal. Ridge plans a romantic evening with Caroline.

Thorne calls Caroline for a date. He later calls again because he heard that Ridge is also having a date with Caroline. Brookes takes this call and tells Thorne to go ahead with his date. She does not tell Caroline about this call. Manipulating them. Beth scolds her for switching men and manipulating Caroline. Ridge prepares to meet Caroline who was busy kissing Thorne. Caroline sees some old newspaper clips about Ridge in Brooke's drawers but disregards and destroys. Rocco visits Ridge at office. Dave consults Storm about the Forresters.
